name: Skate's Delivery
description:
Deliver and upgrade to be the best there is!

Skate's Delivery is an arcade time attack game with roguelike elements, in a lovely small town with anthropomorphic animals.

Skate's was created for 2nd Year production at AIE Adelaide by Team NS. 

Team NS:

Kaidon Rogers: - Project Manager/Level Designer

Chevy Williams - Balance/Flow Design

Ty Davies - Movement Systems

Alexis McSherry - UI Programmer

Shane Hoskin - AI Systems

Diana Field - Character/Animation Artist

Jasmine Campbell - Environmental/Shader Artist

Best played with a gamepad.
